name: Willform Deploy Agent
description: Deploy and manage containerized applications on Kubernetes with pay-per-use billing via x402 payment protocol. Supports four workload types: web apps, databases (StatefulSet with persistent volumes), background workers, and scheduled cronjobs. Includes per-namespace AI agent (Willy) for infrastructure operations.

skills.name: List Chart Types
skills.description: List available workload types (web-app, stateful-db, worker, cronjob) with their capabilities.

skills.name: Pre-Deployment Check
skills.description: Validate a deployment before creating it. Checks quota, balance, image accessibility, chart type suitability, and returns cost estimates.
examples: Check if I can deploy this image
How much will this deployment cost?

skills.name: Create Deployment
skills.description: Deploy a container using the appropriate chart type: web-app (HTTP services), stateful-db (databases with persistent volumes), worker (background processors), or cronjob (scheduled tasks). Call deploy_preflight first to validate.
examples: Deploy nginx:latest as a web app
Deploy postgres:16 as a stateful database with 20GB persistent volume
Deploy a background worker for queue processing
Schedule a cronjob to run every hour

skills.name: Manage Namespaces
skills.description: Get namespace details, update name or resource allocation, list or delete namespaces.

skills.name: Manage Deployments
skills.description: Get status, list, stop, restart, delete, scale replicas, update env vars, diagnose failures, and view logs or K8s events.
examples: Diagnose why my deployment is failing
Show K8s events for my deployment

skills.name: Expose Deployment
skills.description: Expose a stateful-db deployment externally via Cloudflare Tunnel for local client access. Supports HTTP and TCP protocols.
examples: Remove external access from my Redis
I need to connect to my database from my local machine

skills.name: Check Credits
skills.description: Check credit balance for compute billing.
examples: How many credits do I have?

skills.name: Manage Domains
skills.description: Add or remove custom domains for deployments.

skills.name: Namespace Agent
skills.description: Interact with the per-namespace Willy AI agent. Invoke tools, send chat messages, or check agent status.
examples: Check agent status for my namespace
Ask the agent to list running pods
Invoke agent tool to scale deployment

author: Willform

pricing.details: x402 USDC payment protocol. Compute: $0.04/core/hr, Memory: $0.005/GB/hr, Storage: $0.0001/GB/hr. Min top-up $20, max $100 per payment. Pre-launch: not yet publicly available.
